GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: Check correct bounds for stream encoder instances for DCN303

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit 82a27c1855445d48aacc67b0c0640f3dadebe52f, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit cd6d421e3d1ad5926b74091254e345db730e7706. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/amd/display: Check correct bounds for stream encoder instances for DCN303
